Name: transfer.to
Description: zkSync address of the recipient of funds

Name: transfer.fee
Description: Amount of token to be paid as a fee for this transaction.https://merlin-li.github.io/zksync/api/js/accounts#fn5

Name: transfer.nonce
Description: Nonce that is going to be used for this transaction.https://merlin-li.github.io/zksync/api/js/accounts#fn7

Name: transfer.validFrom (optional)
Description: Unix timestamp from which the block with this transaction can be processed

Name: transfer.validUntil (optional)
Description: Unix timestamp until which the block with this transaction can be processed
